title: It’s Too Hot
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>....Kasumin can’t stand it anymore. It’s so hot~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It really is hot, huh~. I heard the temperature won’t drop for the entire day today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uuu, why are we even outside in this heat....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You were the one that wanted to go to this recently opened parfait place, though, Kasumi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin knew that it was popular, but Kasumin didn’t expect having to line up like this.... My head is overheating already....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, that’s right. Here, Kasumi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uwaah, what is it.... A cap?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah, having the sunlight not hit you directly in the head makes a big difference, you know? I can’t let my cute junior get a heatstroke, after all. I’ll lend you my cap.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh, you don't mind? If Kasumin wears this, then You-senpai will....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufu, thanks for thinking about me, but it’s okay. Look, the two groups in front of us have entered the store. Let’s hold on a little longer and eat the most delicious parfait inside the cool air of the store♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
